<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Localizer::localizeIntraBlock(LocalizedSetVecT &amp;LocalizedInstrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each already-localized instruction which has multiple users, then we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scan the block top down from the current position until we hit one of them.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// many users, but this case may be better served by regalloc improvements.</span></CodeLine>
